statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_type FROM fraud_detection WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM fraud_detection GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE fraud_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM fraud_anomalies WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY detected_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM fraud_anomalies WHERE detected_at > '2022-01-01' AND status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND fraud_status = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE fraud_status = FALSE AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.customer_id, t.amount, f.reason FROM transactions t INNER JOIN fraud_anomalies f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.status = 'Under Review' AND t.fraud_status = TRUE;

SELECT t.customer_id, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions t WHERE t.customer_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM fraud_anomalies WHERE status = 'Confirmed') GROUP BY t.customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fraudsters;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Fraudsters ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT address FROM Fraudsters WHERE is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description FROM Anomalies WHERE is_resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Fraudsters WHERE is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, address FROM Fraudsters WHERE user_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT Transactions.*, Anomalies.anomaly_description FROM Transactions INNER JOIN Anomalies ON Transactions.transaction_id = Anomalies.transaction_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE isNewCustomer=true;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE email='example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases WHERE resolved=false ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id
SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 5000

SELECT transactions.transaction_date, fraud_cases.fraudulent_reason FROM transactions LEFT JOIN fraud_cases ON transactions.transaction_id = fraud_cases.transaction_id WHERE fraud_cases.resolved = FALSE
SELECT transactions.*, transaction_logs.log_details FROM transactions JOIN transaction_logs ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE transaction_logs.log_type = 'error'

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.address, transaction_logs.log_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN transaction_logs ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND transaction_logs.log_type = 'info'
SELECT * FROM Account;
SELECT account_id, account_holder FROM Account ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE account_id = 1001;
SELECT detection_category, detection_score FROM FraudDetection WHERE detection_score > 0.5 ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM AnomalyAnalysis ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Account;
SELECT account_id, account_holder, balance FROM Account ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT detection_id, transaction_id, detection_category, detection_score FROM FraudDetection WHERE detection_score > 0.8 ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT account_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM SuspiciousActivity WHERE account_id = 1001 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
